Articles.Content: Someone know how to fix the wobbling from Rockomack decoupler on Skipper?
Have tried all kind of simmetry and point to attach them but it was still going to wobble, the only way to stop it was to put strut on two truss up and down the decoupler...

Okay, for me it was fixed by struts from the outside wall of the tank above the Skipper, to the side/top of the decoupler below.. 4 symetry was enough for a normal sized rocket. (It's not new to me, as most of my designs require struts over (or inside) the engine fairings, to reduce wobble and breaking.)
